name: soos-dast
description: SOOS DAST - The affordable no limit web vulnerability scanner

scripts.setup:clean: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run typecheck && npm outdated
scripts.patch-api-client: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run setup:clean && npm install @soos-io/api-client@latest --save-exact && npm install && npm run check

author: SOOS
